Phrase.Text: So [YourLeaderName], you think you can just waltz in here and colonize worlds that rightfully belong to the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]?
So [YourLeaderName], you think you can just waltz in here and colonize worlds that rightfully belong to the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]? I think not.
So [YourLeaderName], you think you can just waltz in here and colonize worlds that rightfully belong to the [SPEAKING_RACE_NAME]? I think not. Prepare to die.
